info.author: Arnold deVos
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
A little-language for analysing RDF, 
the syntax of the GraphPath is reminiscent of Xpath. 
The graphpath package provides a query evaluator 
and a goal-driven inference engine for this language, 
which work together to perform graph analysis. The package 
can be teamed up with your favourite python RDF API 
(e.g. Redland, rdflib, or your own API).
info.name: GraphPath
info.summary: A little-language for analysing graph-structured data, especially RDF.
info.html_description: A little-language for analysing RDF, the syntax of the GraphPath is reminiscent of Xpath. The graphpath package provides a query evaluator and a goal-driven inference engine for this language, which work together to perform graph analysis. The package can be teamed up with your favourite python RDF API (e.g. Redland, rdflib, or your own API).
